description:
Unlocks the following items: Soma 

A weapon wielded by Kor Meteor in Tales of Hearts.
BGM Change: "Mysterious Arms, Soma"

Sword Skin/Tales series DLC. ATK 50, RES 35. Spark Attack.
Alters Sword Appearance to "Soma" and alters battle music.

*This item is included in the Deco Item: "Tales of" Set.
name: Deco Item: Soma
